EmailTemplate.description: Email to Cellar Master when End User confirms the slot time(LocalXP/EpernayXP)
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience Send Estimated Validation Checked To User&CellarMaster
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Pending Experience Date Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Herv√©,
{!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.OwnerFullName} validated the date. The Experience will take place in {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.PJ_ByFor_PlaceoftheExperience__c}.
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
